metadata.title: CVE-2014-8143

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for Raspberry Pi 12 SP2

metadata.description: Samba 4.0.x before 4.0.24, 4.1.x before 4.1.16, and 4.2.x before 4.2rc4, when an Active Directory Domain Controller (AD DC) is configured, allows remote authenticated users to set the LDB userAccountControl UF_SERVER_TRUST_ACCOUNT bit, and consequently gain privileges, by leveraging delegation of authority for user-account or computer-account creation.

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP2 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for Raspberry Pi 12 SP2 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP1 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP3 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP4 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP5 is installed
